QuestData.Title: Enhancing the Stone
QuestData.Description: <Grimeo finishes packing the materials up in a neatly-wrapped package.>$b$bThat's all that the gnome asked of us. When you see him, make sure you let him know that this task ends my debt. I will not suffer his requests any longer.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Grimeo's Package to Kasim Sharim at the Serpent's Coil in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: This is sufficient. If you see Grimeo again, you may tell him that he performed satisfactorily, but no... his debt is not yet cleared. I will get to work on fashioning the stone knife of sealing. There is no need for questions now. All will be revealed in time.$b$bWhile I work, I have another task for you to complete.$b$bDon't look so upset! This task will be fun... it involves collecting body parts.
